spells.html_content:
Spells

Harpooner
/ Trawler
1 - 7 Range / 2AP

Places an offensive Turret that steals health in the caster's best attack element.

There can only be one Harpooner per team. If the Harpooner is still on the field when placed again, the old one is destroyed to make room for the new one.
Required level: :
1|68|134

Normal effects

Summons
Harpooner Evolutions

No effect for this spell

1

3
Modifiable range
No

Yes
Cast in a straight line only
No
Target necessary
No

Evolves allied Turrets and inflicts Fire damage on enemies in an area of effect.

On an allied Turret at Evolution III in the area of effect:
• Destroys the Turret to inflict additional Fire damage on enemies in a 3-cell circle around it.
• Sets its cooldown period to 0.

spells.html_content:
Spells

Breakwater
/ Compass
1 - 7 Range / 3AP

Applies the Automatic state on an allied Turret and heals it:
• The Turret intercepts close-combat damage suffered by allies adjacent to it when the spell is cast.
• If one of those allies suffers ranged damage, the Turret activates, using its automatic spell on the ally or their attacker.

This activation can only be triggered once per target per turn, and only if the ally or attacker is within the Turret's range.
Required level: :
190

Normal effects

'Automatic' state (2 turns)
Heal: 25% of max HP
Damage interception

Critical effects

No effect for this spell

Recast interval
4
Modifiable range
Yes

Yes

No

Yes

Cross of 1 cell

This activation can only be triggered once per target per turn, and only if the ally or attacker is within the Turret's range.

Signal Box
/ Assistance
1 Range / 2AP

Attracts the target towards the nearest allied Turret in a 5-cell cross around it.
If the target ends its movement next to an allied Turret, that Turret teleports it symmetrically and reapplies the spell's effects on it.

Also works with Turrets.
